subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: first time with frank's box

full_text:

I agree-Ouija's are not dangerous. It is people's own minds that are danger=
ous.

In other words - Ouija Boards don't kill people, people kill people.
=

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: purplespacefriend 
  To: EVP-ITC@y=
ahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, June 29, 2009 12:28 PM
  Subject: [EVP-ITC]=
 Re: first time with frank's box





  I use mine at home, in the basement=
, with the lights on. You don't have to go the "haunted" locations, spirits=
 and entities are everywhere, and they travel, they will come to use if you=
 announce you're doing EVP sesssions. Of course--I make my own boxes. 

  I=
 don't see how a ouija is dangerous. 

  Frank-S
